revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen|Status change}} '''A_BellReset2'''
(''no parameter'')
Finishes reversing the properties of death by reestablishing {{Flag|SHOOTABLE}} and removing the {{Flag|CORPSE}} and KILLED flags. The actor's health is also set to 5. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ZBell}} and derived classes.
